title: [傷兵滿營] 曼聯終極FF轉會新聞暨吹水區[60]

replies.msg:
"Just why would he want to leave a club that is one of the world's biggest, a club on the up, and where he is unquestionably the number one to move to Madrid where he will be on less money and the pressure will be higher?

"Not for the first time in situations like this, the Spanish press have announced that not only does De Gea want to leave but have gone as far as to say that he has even requested a move.

"I have been told that he has not said anything of the kind to United. Why do the Spanish press keeps insisting he wants to go then?" - Guillem Balague

留明學戰術 排陣

留明學戰術 排陣

唔學輪換同用新仔? 一陣傷鳩晒WO

摩佬預先張揚
英超煞科派青年軍出戰


曼聯喺上場英超又失分，加上再添傷兵，要爭前4名拎下屆歐聯入場券真係難上加難。領隊摩連奴都疊埋心水，全力瞄準歐霸盃冠軍好過，話今個月21號對水晶宮嘅英超煞科戰，唔排除會派晒U23年青球員上陣。

曼聯即將喺周四出戰歐霸盃4強首回合，過埋切爾達呢關就可以殺入今個月24號上演嘅決賽，贏到歐霸盃冠軍一樣可以出戰下屆歐聯，摩佬認為難度應該比喺英超同利物浦、曼城同阿仙奴爭前4位置容易：「如果我哋打入歐霸盃決賽，咁決賽前3日場英超煞科戰就要好好諗下，或者我會叫畢特（青年軍主帥）帶佢隊波對水晶宮，希望到時水晶宮已經確定護級成功。」

【子承父業】搶簽卡斯柏
紅魔head住藍月

英國《天空體育》報道，曼聯在李斯特城門將卡斯柏舒米高的爭奪戰中，暫時搶佔了一個領前位置，比同市宿敵曼城更有機會羅致該名丹麥國腳。

報道指假如紅魔鬼門將迪基亞一如所料加盟皇家馬德里，那麼卡斯柏舒米高將是球隊取代該名西班牙門將的首選，有指卡斯柏舒米高離開了合作多時的經理人，轉投意大利籍經理人旗下，後者與曼聯一直保持著良好關係，亦令紅魔鬼佔得先機。
現年30歲的卡斯柏舒米高去年夏天與李斯特城續了一紙五年長約，但一般相信，假如有可能加盟像曼聯這種級數的球會，他將是難以拒絕。老舒米高球員時間曾經在1991至1999年效力曼聯，儘管該位丹麥名宿在退休前亦曾短暫效力曼城一個球季，但他多年來始終是紅魔鬼最具代表性的守門員。

摩佬預先張揚
英超煞科派青年軍出戰


曼聯喺上場英超又失分，加上再添傷兵，要爭前4名拎下屆歐聯入場券真係難上加難。領隊摩連奴都疊埋心水，全力瞄準歐霸盃冠軍好過，話今個月21號對水晶宮嘅英超煞科戰，唔排除會派晒U23年青球員上陣。

曼聯即將喺周四出戰歐霸盃4強首回合，過埋切爾達呢關就可以殺入今個月24號上演嘅決賽，贏到歐霸盃冠軍一樣可以出戰下屆歐聯，摩佬認為難度應該比喺英超同利物浦、曼城同阿仙奴爭前4位置容易：「如果我哋打入歐霸盃決賽，咁決賽前3日場英超煞科戰就要好好諗下，或者我會叫畢特（青年軍主帥）帶佢隊波對水晶宮，希望到時水晶宮已經確定護級成功。」

佢唔咁出死全家

大逆不道呀青

文西有冇試過一場出多過15分鐘
讚完tuanzebe之後接近零出場機會

【子承父業】搶簽卡斯柏
紅魔head住藍月

英國《天空體育》報道，曼聯在李斯特城門將卡斯柏舒米高的爭奪戰中，暫時搶佔了一個領前位置，比同市宿敵曼城更有機會羅致該名丹麥國腳。

報道指假如紅魔鬼門將迪基亞一如所料加盟皇家馬德里，那麼卡斯柏舒米高將是球隊取代該名西班牙門將的首選，有指卡斯柏舒米高離開了合作多時的經理人，轉投意大利籍經理人旗下，後者與曼聯一直保持著良好關係，亦令紅魔鬼佔得先機。
現年30歲的卡斯柏舒米高去年夏天與李斯特城續了一紙五年長約，但一般相信，假如有可能加盟像曼聯這種級數的球會，他將是難以拒絕。老舒米高球員時間曾經在1991至1999年效力曼聯，儘管該位丹麥名宿在退休前亦曾短暫效力曼城一個球季，但他多年來始終是紅魔鬼最具代表性的守門員。

潛力

David De Gea is not pushing to leave Manchester United this summer, sources have told ESPN FC, despite being linked with a transfer to Real Madrid.

Last week, Spanish newspaper Marca reported De Gea had agreed personal terms ahead of a move.

But sources have told ESPN FC that De Gea has not indicated he wants to leave Old Trafford at the end of the season.

He still has two years left on the contract he signed following the breakdown of his move to Real Madrid 2015. There is also an option to extend the deal for an extra year to 2020 should all parties agree.

There is an acceptance among senior figures at Old Trafford that Real offer a significant pull for a player who grew up in the Spanish capital.

However, they are buoyed by De Gea's decision to stay at United last summer and see no reason why he should not make the same choice this time around.

目前，曼聯以34戰得65分既戰績，暫時喺排英超聯賽榜既第5位，距離前四位置只有1分之隔。據了解，紅魔教練摩連奴依家已經開始計劃今夏既陣容補充，甚至準備咗「Plan A」同「Plan B」，然後睇下球隊可唔可以拎到來季既歐聯資格，之後再作相應既收購。




英國《曼徹斯特晚報》報導，為咗增強曼聯既爭冠實力，摩連奴已經準備喺今個夏天，打破普巴喺舊年夏天創下既8900萬鎊轉會費紀錄。不過，「狂人」亦都知道，如果紅魔無辦法喺下季拎到歐聯資格，部份既球星就肯定唔會願意投身奧脫福既，當中就包括摩納哥中場巴卡約高同埋馬體會前鋒基沙文。

隨住伊巴謙莫域、路祖既相繼受傷，再加上門將迪基亞好可能喺今個夏天離隊，令到紅魔季後既收購計劃亦都有所改變，新兵既數目或者多達6位。

「Plan A」（有歐聯資格）：



1：巴卡約高 Tiemoue Bakayoko（摩納哥 / 法國 / 中場）22歲
2：基沙文 Antoine Griezmann（馬德里體育會 / 法國 / 前鋒）26歲
3：奧里亞 Serge Aurier （PSG / 科特迪瓦 / 右閘）24歲
4：連迪路夫 Victor Lindelof（賓菲加 / 瑞典 / 中堅）22歲
5：占美利斯 Jose Gimenez（馬體會 / 烏拉圭 / 中堅）22歲
6：馬昆奴斯 Marquinhos（PSG / 巴西 / 中堅）22歲
7：奧比歷 Jan Oblak（馬體會 / 斯洛文尼亞 / 門將）24歲

「Plan B」（冇歐聯資格）：

1：馬爾古特 Kevin Malcuit（聖伊天 / 法國 / 閘位）25歲
2：祖赫特 Joe Hart （曼城 / 英格蘭 / 門將）29歲
3：卡斯柏普 Rick Karsdorp（飛燕諾 / 荷蘭 / 右閘）22歲

收購list出左

Seeing Record’s headline ‘Bayern makes Semedo easier for Man United’, would make one think things are getting serious between the Benfica player and Jose Mourinho’s side.

But the whole of Record’s story seems to be based upon Bayern thinking the deal is overpriced, rather than Manchester United moving in.

The newspaper actually does a fine job reporting that the German side are not so keen on paying the price demanded by Benfica, which is at least the €35m. The Portuguese club’s idea is to sell Nelson Semedo for more than they got for Renato Sanches.


CapturarBayern have watched Semedo many times this season and would want the player to replace Philipp Lahm at the club, but their intention would be to get him for a €20m fee.

That’s why Manchester United, who have been heavily linked to the player during the January window, would now find themselves in a better position to sign the player.

Record has no updates on the negotiations between the clubs. They only say Manchester United continue scouting Benfica’s games, and Record take this as a sign they’re still interested.

Semedo has an €80m release clause, and as Portuguese clubs often do, Benfica will use that as a bargaining stance. The €35m it’s said is now demanded by Benfica, could change quickly if more clubs show an interest.

Such a figure would be no problem for Manchester United if Nelson Semedo is the man Jose Mourinho wants.

Manchester United have contacted Torino to register their interest in striker Andrea Belotti, sources have told ESPN FC.

United manager Jose Mourinho is determined to add two forwards to his squad this summer, with Atletico Madrid's Antoine Griezmann the priority target.

And Mourinho is also considering a move for Belotti, 23, who has scored 27 goals in 34 appearances for Torino this season, with 25 of those coming in 31 Serie A games.

Sources have told ESPN FC that senior figures at United have discussed the Italy international with their Torino counterparts, who secured the player to a new contract -- tying him to the club until 2021 -- as recently as December.

Torino president Urbano Cairo revealed at the time that Belotti had negotiated a €100 million release clause in the contract, applicable only if the player moves to a club outside Italy.

United will be without Zlatan Ibrahimovic until January 2018 at the earliest -- if the 35-year-old extends his contract this summer -- following his recent cruciate ligament injury and it is reported that the club's all-time leading goal scorer Wayne Rooney will be allowed to leave at the end of the season, with the Chinese Super League appearing the most likely destination.

With Mourinho facing up to the loss of two experienced forwards, he has made it clear to executive vice-chairman Ed Woodward that the squad needs top quality attacking reinforcements to compete with Marcus Rashford and Anthony Martial.

A move for Griezmann would be simplified if United can secure qualification for next season's Champions League, but regardless of the club's pursuit of the Atletico man, additional attackers will be signed.

United are also interested in Everton's Romelu Lukaku and Monaco's Kylian Mbappe, but Belotti, a powerful and imposing striker, is a player who fits Mourinho's traditional profile of a centre-forward.

There is a view that United are planning for the summer with two separate target lists, centred on whether the club returns to the Champions League or if they face another campaign in the Europa League.

Mourinho, who wants to strengthen all departments of his squad, is also interested in Burnley defender Michael Keane, Chelsea midfielder Willian, Monaco's Tiemoue Bakayoko and Eric Dier of Tottenham.

And with uncertainty surrounding the future of David De Gea due to renewed interest from Real Madrid, Mourinho may also be forced to recruit a new goalkeeper this summer.

However, sources have told ESPN FC that De Gea is not pushing to leave United at the end of the season despite being linked with a transfer to Madrid.

1993/94、1994/95和1995/96球季，雲高爾率領阿積士所向披靡，連續三次獲得荷甲聯賽冠軍。而雲高爾執教生涯的巔峰則是1995年，這一年他帶領年輕的阿積士一舉殺入歐洲冠軍球會盃決賽。平均年齡僅23歲的阿積士在決賽中對陣強大的AC米蘭，最終雲高爾換上的19歲的小將古華特在第85分鐘攻入了制勝球，阿積士獲得了他們歷史上第四次獲得歐洲冠軍球會盃冠軍。隨後球隊又先後獲得了歐洲超級盃和洲際盃冠軍，完成了這一年洲際賽事的大滿貫。

I'm not ITK nor am I claiming to be, but I heard something that might be interesting and wanted to pass it on.

I'm in Monaco at the moment and last night I met the girl who has basically been...physically-involved, let's say - with Mendy ever since he moved to Monaco last summer. She goes to Uni here and has been spending alot of time at his place but stopped short of calling him her boyfriend.

Anyway, he has apparently told her that he's 100% certain to come to the PL in the summer and that it's between Chelsea, City and United.

She reckons he'll go to Chelsea but that might be wishful thinking because she's going to continue her studies in Westminster next year.

She also said that he's prone to partying a little too much and would be even better than he is now if he was fully focused on his football.

I asked her to tell him to choose United next time she sees him (which was supposed to be later that night). She promised to do so.

This post might sound funny, but whatever. Just telling the truth.
